kosmomod24:VoidParticles.NAME: Void Particles
kosmomod24:VoidParticles.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When kosmomod24:Consumed, NL kosmomod24:Void and Gain !B! Block.
kosmomod24:VoidParticles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When kosmomod24:Consumed, NL kosmomod24:Void !M! and Gain !B! Block.

kosmomod24:MatterAggregation.NAME: Matter Aggregation
kosmomod24:MatterAggregation.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Astral. NL When kosmomod24:Consumed, gain !B! Block and [E].

kosmomod24:DormantStar.NAME: Dormant Star
kosmomod24:DormantStar.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be kosmomod24:Exhumed. NL kosmomod24:Void. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.
kosmomod24:DormantStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cannot be kosmomod24:Exhumed. NL kosmomod24:Void !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

kosmomod24:KosmoVoid.NAME: Kosmo Void
kosmomod24:KosmoVoid.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL if you draw a Kosmo card, gain [E]. Non-Kosmo cards are Exhausted upon draw.

kosmomod24:DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
kosmomod24:DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When kosmomod24:Consumed gain !B! Block, NL deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

kosmomod24:KosmoEmergency.NAME: Kosmo Emergency
kosmomod24:KosmoEmergency.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 random Kosmo card. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoDelta.NAME: Kosmo Delta
kosmomod24:KosmoDelta.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Purge a card in your hand.

kosmomod24:ForcedRelease.NAME: Forced Release
kosmomod24:ForcedRelease.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void 2. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoExhaustion.NAME: Kosmo Exhaustion
kosmomod24:KosmoExhaustion.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:Meteorite.NAME: Meteorite
kosmomod24:Meteorite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When kosmomod24:Consumed create a copy in the discard pile with damage NL increased by !M!.

kosmomod24:KosmoNuclearFusion.NAME: Kosmo Nuclear Fusion
kosmomod24:KosmoNuclearFusion.DESCRIPTION: Purge a card in your Exhaust pile. Gain [E].
kosmomod24:KosmoNuclearFusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Purge a card in your Exhaust pile. Gain [E] and draw a card.

kosmomod24:SolarFlux.NAME: Solar Flux
kosmomod24:SolarFlux.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the drawn card is Kosmo, apply !M! Vulnerable.

kosmomod24:KosmoRadiation.NAME: Kosmo Radiation
kosmomod24:KosmoRadiation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust 2 random cards from your hand.

kosmomod24:KosmoEcplisper.NAME: Kosmo Ecplisper
kosmomod24:KosmoEcplisper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

kosmomod24:CosmicRay.NAME: Cosmic Ray
kosmomod24:CosmicRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle *Matter *Aggregation into your discard pile.

kosmomod24:QuantumQuasar.NAME: Quantum Quasar
kosmomod24:QuantumQuasar.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL kosmomod24:Exhume. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:Supernova.NAME: Supernova
kosmomod24:Supernova.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If kosmomod24:Consumed, kosmomod24:Void !M!.

kosmomod24:KosmoVoyager.NAME: Kosmo Voyager
kosmomod24:KosmoVoyager.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void 2. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Purge a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:HyperdriveMode.NAME: Hyperdrive Mode
kosmomod24:HyperdriveMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E]. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into the Discard pile.
kosmomod24:HyperdriveMode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] and next turn. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into the Discard pile.

kosmomod24:SingularityMealtdown.NAME: Singularity Mealtdown
kosmomod24:SingularityMealtdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kosmomod24:Play and Purge a random card from the Exhaust pile. NL Shuffle !M! Dazed into the Exhaust pile.

kosmomod24:BlindWarp.NAME: Blind Warp
kosmomod24:BlindWarp.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Exhume !M! random cards. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into the Exhaust pile.

kosmomod24:KosmoDuplication.NAME: Kosmo Duplication
kosmomod24:KosmoDuplication.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Add !M! *Void *Particles to your hand. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.NAME: Echo Of The Void
kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you Exhaust or Purge a card gain 1 Strength.
kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time each turn you Exhaust or Purge a card gain 1 Strength.

kosmomod24:FamishedWorldsire.NAME: Famished Worldsire
kosmomod24:FamishedWorldsire.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Excavate !M! cards. Choose !kosmomod24:m2! cards to draw.

kosmomod24:Pulsar.NAME: Pulsar
kosmomod24:Pulsar.DESCRIPTION: Purge up to 3 cards in your hand. NL Heal !M! for each card. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoTroopers.NAME: Kosmo Troopers
kosmomod24:KosmoTroopers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

kosmomod24:Kosmology.NAME: Kosmology
kosmomod24:Kosmology.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle *Void *Particle into your draw pile.
kosmomod24:Kosmology.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Void *Particles into your draw pile.

kosmomod24:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
kosmomod24:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Matter *Aggregation into your hand.

kosmomod24:SBSP.NAME: SBSP
kosmomod24:SBSP.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted or Purge, NL gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

kosmomod24:MechaDestroyer.NAME: Mecha Destroyer
kosmomod24:MechaDestroyer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust and Purge a card in your hand.

kosmomod24:KosmoCrusader.NAME: Kosmo Crusader
kosmomod24:KosmoCrusader.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.
kosmomod24:KosmoCrusader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void !M!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:Hyperleap.NAME: Hyperleap
kosmomod24:Hyperleap.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.
kosmomod24:Hyperleap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust !kosmomod24:m2! cards in your hand.

kosmomod24:KosmoDeflector.NAME: Kosmo Deflector
kosmomod24:KosmoDeflector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Purge 2 random cards in your hand.
kosmomod24:KosmoDeflector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 2 random cards in your hand.

kosmomod24:NuclearStrike.NAME: Nuclear Strike
kosmomod24:NuclearStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Shuffle !M! Dazed into the Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:PlasmaWave.NAME: Plasma Wave
kosmomod24:PlasmaWave.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Play and Purge !M! random cards from the Exhaust pile. NL Shuffle !kosmomod24:m2! Dazed into the Exhaust pile.

kosmomod24:KosmoStarArchitect.NAME: Kosmo Star Architect
kosmomod24:KosmoStarArchitect.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Dormant *Star into the Exhaust pile.
kosmomod24:KosmoStarArchitect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Dormant *Star+ into the Exhaust pile.

kosmomod24:KosmoPurifier.NAME: Kosmo Purifier
kosmomod24:KosmoPurifier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Purge !M! Dazed from the Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoGalaxy.NAME: Kosmo Galaxy
kosmomod24:KosmoGalaxy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose !M! cards from the Exhaust pile to kosmomod24:Play and Purge. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoHorizonForm.NAME: Kosmo Horizon Form
kosmomod24:KosmoHorizonForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of each turn  NL kosmomod24:Exhume and NL Exhaust a card in your hand.
kosmomod24:KosmoHorizonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn  NL kosmomod24:Exhume and NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

kosmomod24:KosmoSanctuary.NAME: Kosmo Sanctuary
kosmomod24:KosmoSanctuary.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Kosmo card is played twice.
kosmomod24:KosmoSanctuary.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 Kosmo cards are played twice.

kosmomod24:Nebula.NAME: Nebula
kosmomod24:Nebula.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Graveyard. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When you play a Kosmo card, return into your hand. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:Terraforming.NAME: Terraforming
kosmomod24:Terraforming.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain X amount of a random kosmomod24:Buff.
kosmomod24:Terraforming.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain X+1 amount of a random kosmomod24:Buff.
